text: Karl Schiewerling (18 May 1951 â€“ 28 February 2021) was a German politician. He was born in Essen, Germany. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany. He was a member of the German Bundestag from 2005 to 2017. Schiewerling died at his home in Nottuln, Germany on 28 February 2021 from problems caused by cancer, aged 69.Karl Schiewerling ist im Alter von 69 Jahren verstorben ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Essen Category:Cancer deaths in Germany
title: Karl Schiewerling
